_header: The higher that the plums be
_description: Proverbial saying about reaching for the unattainable — two couplets

HunHM131.Transcription:
The heyer that the ploumes beThe heyer that the tre Bethe
                    Ryppere be the plomesthe [ ] fer that…
HunHM131.Note:
Added to lower margin by a hand of sixteenth century; last line mostly
                    indecipherable; possibly related to 837.
HunHM131.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.”

Dutschke,  C. W.
